forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 9am. Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight settles in over Downtown San Francisco, a soft shroud of fog begins its quiet dominion, weaving through the streets like a gentle whisper. The cool evening air hovers around a comfortable 56 degrees, with a west-southwest breeze brushing past in playful gusts, offering a refreshing contrast to the mild warmth that dances nearby. This interplay of fog and wind sets an introspective tone, inviting evening wanderers to embrace the serene ambiance of the city.

Tomorrow dawns with promise, as the fog drifts away before the sun ascends, revealing a bright canvas of blue adorned with fleeting clouds. As the day warms to levels close to 70 degrees, the afternoon invites leisurely strolls and easy conversations in parks or cafes, perhaps while enjoying a favorite book or savoring a cup of coffee al fresco. The gentle winds will persist, a reminder of the ocean’s proximity, perfect for donning a light sweater or a casual jacket. With the city alive yet unhurried, one might find joy in exploring hidden alleys, discovering local crafts at a nearby market, or simply basking in the warmth of the sun, letting the day unfold naturally with the rhythm of life in this storied city.
